item.title: Brett add a quote by walt whitman
item.description: "All goes onward and outward, nothing collapses, And to die is different from what any one supposed, and luckier." -- walt whitman

item.title: Brett add a quote by Jon Sobrino
item.description: "The Resurrection of Jesus is...a symbol of hope...I don't see how you can show love...without being in solidarity with the victims of this world. And if you are in solidarity with the victims, I don't see how you can avoid the cross. The theology of the cross is the theology of love in our real world." -- Jon Sobrino

item.title: Brett add a quote by George MacDonald
item.description: "The world...is full of resurrections... Every night that folds us up in darkness is a death; and those of you that have been out early, and have seen the first of the dawn, will know it - the day rises out of the night like a being that has burst its tomb and escaped into life." -- George MacDonald
